item.description:
Education - Class

Wednesday, February 24, 2010

6:00pm - 8:00pm
Location:
LB Wheaton
259 Park Ave
Worcester, MA

Learn about your camera and take a look at the new Canon 5D and 7D. We’ll show you how to use the camera you already have and teach you what all those buttons are for, what they do and how to use them to take great pictures. No purchase necessary, and this is absolutely FREE!! Light refreshments will also be served.

We are limited to the first 15 registrations to make sure everyone gets individual attention, so be sure to RSVP right away.
Wednesday February 24th – 6:00 to 8:00 PM.
259 Park Ave, in the LB Wheaton Store.

Please note – each guest must register themselves and supply accurate information so we can follow up and give you a reminder.

Register (RSVP on Meetup is not registering!)

http://lbwheaton.com/...
item.how_to_find_us: Scott and I are always to try to greet everyone who comes to the meetups. We'll

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Learn about your camera
